oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Microcantilever based biosensors
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PORWAL, A
NARSUDE, M
RAO, VR
MUKHERJI, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: force microscope
sensor
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: By combining silicon micromechanical techniques with surface functionalization, it is possible to realize MEMS (Micro-Electro-Mechanical system) systems for biological analysis. In this review, we summarize the working principle of a few selected MEMS bio-sensing devices. We also discuss the fabrication and operational aspects of such sensors and in particular immunosensors which employ the unique principle-of anti body-antigen interaction. A complete overview of biological sensing using microcantilevers is presented.
